messages.title: Only Labour can beat the Tories in Putney
messages.content: Our NHS is at breaking point, teachers and parents are in revolt over planned cuts to school funding and the Tories still don't take environmental concerns like air quality seriously. Vote Labour for a new approach and a government that will fight for ordinary working people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Defending the NHS and Social Care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will give the NHS and social care the money they need.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting Living Standards and Creating Jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will introduce a real Living Wage of £10 and invest in infrastructure, skills and new technology.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Giving All Children a Chance to Achieve Their Potential
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will reduce class sizes and provide universal free school meals for primary school children.
Labour will hire more police in your community and strengthen protection for victims.
Labour will build more than one million new homes in five years and control rent.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can beat the Tories in Putney.

issues.brexitEurope: This election will not determine whether Britain will leave the EU, but it will decide what type of country Britain is post-Brexit.
issues.education: Teachers and parents are in revolt over planned cuts to school funding. Labour will reduce class sizes and provide universal free school meals for primary school children.
issues.environment: The Tories still don't take environmental concerns like air quality seriously.
issues.health: Our NHS is at breaking point. Accident & Emergency departments are in crisis and waiting times are going up. Labour will give the NHS and social care the money they need. The Government is quietly dismantling one of our greatest ever achievements.
issues.labourEmployment: Labour will introduce a real Living Wage of £10 and invest in infrastructure, skills and new technology.

community.content: Home ownership or renting locally should not be out of reach for many in London. Labour will build more than one million new homes in five years and control rent.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have worked as a doctor for over 20 years. I trained as a consultant at both St. George's Hospital and Guy’s and St. Thomas’. I've seen first hand the effects that this government is having on our NHS. I'll do my utmost to protect our health service.

endorsements.endorser: Leonie Cooper, Assembly for Merton and Wandsworth
endorsements.endorsement: Only Labour can beat the Tories in Putney.

examples: Working families are set to be on average over £1,400 worse off a year.
Six million people earn less than the Living Wage.
Labour will build more than one million new homes in five years.
Our NHS is at breaking point.
Accident & Emergency departments are in crisis.
The Government is having on our NHS.
Home ownership or renting locally.
Make our neighbourhoods safer.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Putney, Roehampton and Southfields are fantastic places to live, work and thrive.
nonPolicyAttributes.employment: I have worked as a doctor for over 20 years.

examples: Putney, Roehampton and Southfields are fantastic places to live, work and thrive. As your MP I’ll be fighting your corner and putting your concerns first.
